data.name: About
data.comment: Context menu text for About dialog.

data.name: Application
data.comment: Text for Application category in settings dialog.

data.name: BalloonTimeout
data.comment: Text for Balloon Timeout in settings dialog.

data.name: BalloonTimeoutDescription
data.value: Enter how long (in seconds) the balloon notifications should remain on screen. Please note that Windows may override this setting.
data.comment: Description of Balloon Timeout in settings dialog.

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: Text for a Cancel button.

data.name: CheckInterval
data.comment: Text for Check Interval in settings dialog.

data.name: CheckIntervalDescription
data.value: Enter how often (in minutes) Google Wave Notifier should check for new messages.
data.comment: Description of Check Interval in settings dialog.

data.name: CheckIntervalWarningText
data.value: Check interval must be 5 minutes or greater.
data.comment: Warning text for invalid Check Interval.

data.name: CheckNow
data.comment: Context menu text for checking for unread messages immediately.

data.name: Close
data.comment: Text for a Close button.

data.name: Exit
data.comment: Context menu text for Exit.

data.name: GoogleAffiliationDisclaimer
data.value: Google Wave Notifier is not an official Google application, nor is it affiliated with Google in any way.
data.comment: Disclaimer stating this application is in no way affiliate with Google.

data.name: HelpTranslate
data.comment: Context menu text for launching translation page.

data.name: LoginDetails
data.comment: Text for Login Details category in settings dialog.

data.name: LoginFailed
data.comment: Balloon title when login fails.

data.name: LoginFailedDescription
data.value: Unable to login to Google Wave. Please check your username, password and proxy settings. See the ErrorLog for more details.
data.comment: Balloon text when login fails.

data.name: NewMessages
data.comment: Balloon title when there are unread messages in Google Wave.

data.name: NewMessagesDescription1
data.comment: Balloon text for a wave having a single unread message.

data.name: NewMessagesDescription2to4
data.comment: Balloon text for a wave having a number of unread messages (2-4).

data.name: NewMessagesDescription5plus
data.comment: Balloon text for a wave having a number of unread messages (5 or more).

data.name: NewMessagesTooltipPlural
data.value: You have {0} unread messages across {1} waves.
data.comment: Tooltip text for unread messages across multiple waves.

data.name: NewMessagesTooltipSingleMessage
data.comment: Tooltip text for a single unread message.

data.name: NewMessagesTooltipSingleWave
data.value: You have {0} unread messages in 1 wave.
data.comment: Tooltip text for unread messages in a single wave.

data.name: NewVersionAvailable
data.value: New Version of Google Wave Notifier
data.comment: Balloon title when a new version is available.

data.name: NewVersionAvailableDescription
data.comment: Balloon text when a new version is available.

data.name: NoNewMessagesTooltip
data.comment: Tooltip text when no unread messages.

data.name: Notifications
data.comment: Text for Notifications category in settings dialog.

data.name: OK
data.comment: Text for an OK button.

data.name: OpenGoogleWave
data.comment: Context menu text for launching Google Wave.

data.name: Password
data.comment: Text for Password in settings dialog.

data.name: PasswordDescription
data.value: Enter your Google password. This is stored only on your machine, and only ever transmitted to Google via SSL.
data.comment: Description of Password in settings dialog.

data.name: PlaySounds
data.comment: Text for Play Sounds in settings dialog.

data.name: PlaySoundsDescription
data.value: Select whether you'd like Google Wave Notifier to play the Windows New Mail sound when it finds new messages.
data.comment: Description of Play Sounds in settings dialog.

data.name: PreferredBrowser
data.comment: Text for Browser in settings dialog.

data.name: PreferredBrowserDescription
data.value: Select the browser you would like to use when launching wave.
data.comment: Description of Browser in settings dialog.

data.name: PreferredCulture
data.comment: Text for Language in settings dialog.

data.name: PreferredCultureDescription
data.value: Select the language you would like Google Wave Notifier to use. Changing this value will cause the application to restart with your new language.
data.comment: Description of Language in settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyAddress
data.comment: Label for Proxy Address in settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyAddressDescription
data.value: If you have a proxy server, enter the address of it here (in the form http://proxyname:port/).
data.comment: Description for Proxy Address in settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyPassword
data.comment: Label for Proxy Password in settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyPasswordDescription
data.value: If your proxy server requires a password, please enter it here.
data.comment: Description for Proxy Passwordin settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyServer
data.comment: Text for Proxy Server category in settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyUsername
data.comment: Label for Proxy Username in settings dialog.

data.name: ProxyUsernameDescription
data.value: If your proxy server requires a username, please enter it here.
data.comment: Description for Proxy Username in settings dialog.

data.name: ReportBugOrSuggestion
data.comment: Label for reporting bugs or suggestions.

data.name: RunAtStartup
data.comment: Test for Run At Startup in settings dialog.

data.name: RunAtStartupDescription
data.value: Select whether you'd like Google Wave Notifier to start up when Windows starts.
data.comment: Description of Run At Startup in settings dialog.

data.name: Settings
data.comment: Context menu text for Settings.

data.name: SettingsIntro
data.value: Please configure settings and preferences below. Please pay attention to the descriptions shown in the bottom pane when you select an option.
data.comment: Intro text on Settings dialog.

data.name: SingleClickCheck
data.comment: Text for Single Click Check in settings dialog.

data.name: SingleClickCheckDescription
data.value: Select whether you'd like Google Wave Notifier to force a check for new messages when you click the icon in the system tray.
data.comment: Description of Single Click Check in settings dialog.

data.name: Twitter
data.comment: Label alongside my twitter username.

data.name: UnableToLoadInbox
data.comment: Balloon title when unable to load inbox.

data.name: UnableToLoadInboxDescription
data.value: Unable to load your Google Wave inbox. It's possible Google have changed the web application. Please look out for a new version of Google Wave Notifier!
data.comment: Balloon text when unable to load inbox.

data.name: UnableToParseInbox
data.comment: Balloon title when unable to parse inbox.

data.name: UnableToParseInboxDescription
data.value: Unable to parse your Google Wave inbox. It's possible Google have changed the web application. Please look out for a new version of Google Wave Notifier!
data.comment: Balloon text when unable to parse inbox.

data.name: UnknownError
data.comment: Balloon title when an unknown error occurs.

data.name: UnknownErrorDescription
data.value: An unknown error has occurred. It's possible Google have changed the web application. Please report a bug including the contents of the error log file.
data.comment: Balloon text when an unknown error occurs.

data.name: UnknownErrorDescriptionDotNet
data.value: Google Wave Notifier requires .NET 3.5 SP1. Please check you have this installed and restart the application.
data.comment: Balloon text when an unknown error occurs which may be as a result of not having .NET 3.5 SP1.

data.name: Username
data.comment: Text for Username in settings dialog.

data.name: UsernameDescription
data.value: Enter your Google username. This is the bit before @googlewave.com. Do not include @googlewave.com!
data.comment: Description of Username in settings dialog.

data.name: UsernameWarningText
data.comment: Warning text for invalid Username.

data.name: ValidationError
data.comment: Text for Validation Error on settings dialog.

data.name: Wave
data.comment: Label alongside my wave address.

data.name: Website
data.comment: Label alongside the website address.
